solution_line_template: Since barbara needs ${watch_cost}, and she currently has ${current_savings}, she is remaining with ${watch_cost}-${current_savings} = $<<{watch_cost}-{current_savings}={remaining_to_save}>>{remaining_to_save} to save
With an allowance of ${weekly_allowance} each week, she'll need to save for {remaining_to_save}/{weekly_allowance} = {weeks_needed} weeks
